pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reusable Django application that adds a DurationField implementationThe django-durationfield package is a implementation for `#2443 <http://code.djangoproject.com/ticket/2443>`_,"Add IntervalField to database models." Since the existing patch was notcommitted before the 1.2 feature deadline, this package attempts to make thepatch into a reusable application that provides a ``DurationField``.
